name: Final order granted (you are divorced) applicant and respondent (JOINT AND SOLE) (SOLICITOR)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
((isSole??Applicant))((isJoint??Applicant 1)): ((applicant name))
((isSole??Respondent))((isJoint??Applicant 2)): ((respondent name))
Issue date: ((date of issue))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name))

The final order has been granted on this ((isJoint??joint)) ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)) application.

View and download the final order: ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Final order granted:  ((reference number))
